swatch.label: Input option name to show swatch style

gradient_background.label: Background gradient
gradient_background.info: Background gradient replaces background where possible.

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

variant_pills.name: Variant pills
variant_pills.paragraph: Variant pills are one way of displaying your product variants. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#variant-picker-block)

popups.name: Dropdowns and pop-ups
popups.paragraph: Affects areas like navigation dropdowns, pop-up modals.

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

show_free_shipping_notification.label: Show free shipping notification
show_free_shipping_notification.info: Encourage customers add more to cart to earn free shipping.

minimum_order_price_for_free_shipping.label: Minimum order price for free shipping
minimum_order_price_for_free_shipping.info: Enter the minimum number based on order price that matches your free shipping rate. The free shipping amount displayed in the Cart will be automatically exchanged when the visitor switches currencies on the website. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/general-settings/theme-settings#cart)

paragraph__grid.content: Affects areas with a multicolumn layout.

paragraph.content: Up to total 10 products can be seen at a time.

show_excerpts.label: Show excerpts
show_excerpts.info: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)

avatar.label: Avatar
avatar.info: Will be scaled down to 40 x 40px

blog.label: Blog
blog.post_limit: Number of blog posts to show

brands.show_view_all: Enable "View all" if list includes more brands than shown

colors.label: Color scheme
colors.has_cards_info: To change the card color scheme, update your theme settings.

carousel.label: Carousel
carousel.info: Recommended when 'Column block' is greater than the number of 'Products per row (desktop)'
carousel.heading_3: Number of slides to display tablet

desktop_content_position.label: Desktop content position
desktop_content_position.info: Position is automatically optimized for mobile. This setting applies to the position of the entrie content block

desktop_include_margins.label: Make content margins the same as theme design

heading.name: Section header
heading.label: Heading
heading.info__1: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.info__2: Leave the heading label blank to hide the icon column.

image_height.label: Banner height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

mobile_layout.show_navigation_on_mobile: Show navigation as arrows on mobile

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-collection-show-product-rating)

show_swatch.label: Show color swatch
show_swatch.info: Only shows if option swatch is enabled

button_style.label: Quick add button
button_style.info__1: (Button style 'Following cursor' is only used for layout 'Grid')

select_content.label: Select content
select_content.info: (The 'Content from product description' feature only functions on the product detail page)

show_text_below.label: Show content below image on mobile
show_text_below.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

spacing.info_negative: Negative top margin allows you to push content area to overlap on image banner

text_alignment.label: Content alignment
text_alignment.info__1: Use this setting to align your content

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

image.info: Can only be used when choosing a masonry layout

image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if blog includes more blog posts than shown

settings.info__1: The below settings only apply for the "Grid" layout
settings.info__2: The below settings only apply for the "Carousel" layout

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" if collection has more products than shown

header__1.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

paragraph__1.content: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers/manage-customers)

enable_country_selector.label: Enable country/region selector
enable_country_selector.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

enable_language_selector.label: Enable language selector
enable_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

show_policy.label: Show policy links
show_policy.info: To add store policies, go to your [policy settings](/admin/settings/legal).

logo_position.label: Desktop logo position
logo_position.info: (This setting only applies for Header layout style: Classic)

menu_alignment_desktop.label: Desktop menu alignment
menu_alignment_desktop.info: Menu alignment is automatically aligned to left on mobile and when the logo position option of "Middle center" is selected.

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky_header.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.

logo_transparent.label: Logo image
logo_transparent.info: If no logo is set here it will use the default logo image instead
logo_transparent.info__3: This setting only applies to headers with a background color, not a background gradient color.

layout.label: Desktop image placement
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.
layout.info__1: Triggered when there are multiple images

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

layout.label: Desktop image placement
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

paragraph.content: Add a image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

enable_filtering.label: Enable filtering
enable_filtering.info: Allow your customers to filter results by product availability, price, color, and more. [Customize filters](/admin/menus)

filter_type.label: Desktop filter layout
filter_type.info: Drawer is the default mobile layout.

show_collection_description.label: Show collection description
show_collection_description.info: Add a description by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: Add a image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

swatch.label: Input option name to show swatch style

pill.label: Input option name to show pill style

banner.label: Banner
banner.info: Banner position must be less than Number of products per page

image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections)

inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
inventory_threshold.info: Choose 0 to always show in stock if available.

layout.label: Layout
layout.info: These settings apply for vertical layout

header__1.info: Choose an icon or add an image for each column or row.

swatch.label: Input option name to show swatch style
swatch.info: Only shows if option 'Pills' is chosen

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: When enabled, gift card products can optionally be sent to a recipient with a personal message.

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

size_chart.name: Size chart
size_chart.label__2: Using different size chart for product by following
size_chart.info__3: When you choose: Product type or Product vendor

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)
To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

media_size.label: Desktop media size
media_size.info: Media is automatically optimized for mobile.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

header__2.info: Blog card styles also apply to page cards in search results. To change card styles update your theme settings.

map_address.label: Map address
map_address.info: Google Maps will load this location

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/customers)

paragraph__1.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/themes/development/recommended-products)

text.name: Text
text.info: Can only be used when bold text

slide_height.label: Slide height
slide_height.info: Slide height will always set to 100% screen height on desktop.

accessibility.label: Slideshow description
accessibility.info: Describe the slideshow for customers using screen readers.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

enable_autoplay.label: Enable autoplay
enable_autoplay.info: (Only works when the video is not autoplaying and has no content)

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

paragraph.content: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

layout.label: Desktop video placement
layout.info: Video first is the default mobile layout.

location.label: Location
location.info: Each position is separated by |. Example: Blackburn, UK | Melbourne, AU | Sydney, AU

time.label: Time
time.info: Each position is separated by |. Example: 20 mins | 50 mins | 2 hours
